metadata.description: Create new or use an existing Log Analytic Workspace
Identify whether to use a new or existing vnet
Specify the Azure Region for your new or existing OMS workspace
Specify the SKU for Log Analytics
Use an existing Automation account or create a new
Identify whether to use a new or existing vnet
Specify the Azure Region for your OMS Automation Account
Specify the Azure Region for your OMS Automation Account
Choose the SKU for linked workspace  , only valid  if workspaceType is Linked otherwise ignored.
Specify the username  for Hana Monitoring Role
Specify the password  for Hana Monitoring Role
Specify the Hybrid Worker Group Name
Specify the Azure Region for your OMS Automation Account
Specify the Azure Region for your OMS Automation Account
The base URI where artifacts required by this template are located
The sasToken required to access _artifactsLocation.  When the template is deployed using the accompanying scripts, a sasToken will be automatically generated.

ingestParentRunbook.name: AzureSAPHanaCollector-MS
ingestParentRunbook.description: Runbook to collect SAP Hana information and metrics into Log Analytics

ingestSchedulerRunbook.name: AzureSAPHanaInitialization-MS
ingestSchedulerRunbook.description: Runbook to automatically create required schedules and variables for SAP Hana data collection

customSolution.name: Azure SAP HANA Monitor
customSolution.description: Monitor SAP Hana with Azure Log Analytics
customSolution.author: volkanc@microsoft.com

variables.opsInsightWorkspaceKeyDescription: Encrypted value of the user's omsWorkspaceKey
variables.createScheduleAutomationAccountDescripti: The name of the Automation Account
variables.createScheduleResourceGroupDescription: The name of the resource group

alertArray.description: Azure VMs which shutdown from within operating system  will continue incurring charges. Stop the VM from the portal to prevent unnecessary consumption.
alertArray.query: Type=AzureSAPHanaMonitoring_CL MetricName_s=VMInventory Status_s=Stopped | measure countdistinct(ID_s) by AzureSubscription_s,VmName_s
alertArray.alertName: Azure VM Found in Stopped State

alertArray.description: Each Azure Subscription has quotas for VM cores per region. If the quota is reached new VMs annot be created
alertArray.query: Type=AzureSAPHanaMonitoring_CL MetricName_s=ARMVMUsageStats   | EXTEND div(product(currentValue_d,100),limit_d) as UsedPct | Measure Max(UsedPct) by Location_s,Usagemetric_s | where AggregatedValue >90
alertArray.alertName: Azure Quota Usage Reached  90% of the Subscription Quota

Donut.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMInventory ShowinDesigner_d!=0 |measure countdistinct(ID_s) by AzureSubscription_s

List.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMInventory ShowinDesigner_d!=0 |measure countdistinct(ID_s) by AzureSubscription_s,Status_s

LineChart.Query: [concat('Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=ScaleSetInventory ShowinDesigner_d=1  |measure sum(RunningVMs_d) as RunningVMs by SubscriptionId interval ', parameters('dataCollectionFrequency'),'Minutes')]

List.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=ScaleSetInventory ShowinDesigner_d=1 |measure countdistinct(ID_s) by AzureSubscription_s,SubscriptionId

Donut.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMInventory ShowinDesigner_d!=0 | measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by HWProfile_s

List.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMInventory ShowinDesigner_d!=0 | measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by HWProfile_s

Donut.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMInventory ShowinDesigner_d!=0 | measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by Location_s

List.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMInventory ShowinDesigner_d!=0| measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by Location_s

Donut.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMInventory ShowinDesigner_d!=0| measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by DeploymentType_s

List.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMInventory ShowinDesigner_d!=0| measure countdistinct(ID_s) by   AzureSubscription_s,DeploymentType_s,OperatingSystem_s

LineChart.Query: [concat('Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMInventory ShowinDesigner_d!=0 | measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by Status_s interval ', parameters('dataCollectionFrequency'),'Minutes')]

List.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMInventory Status_s=Running ShowinDesigner_d!=0|  measure countdistinct(VmName_s)  by  HWProfile_s

Tile.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMInventory ShowinDesigner_d!=0|measure countdistinct(Tag_s) by AzureSubscription_s

List.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMInventory ShowinDesigner_d!=0|measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by Tag_s

Donut.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMNIC ShowinDesigner_d!=0| measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by subnet_s

List.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMNIC ShowinDesigner_d!=0| measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by AzureSubscription_s,subnet_s

List.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMEndpoint ShowinDesigner_d!=0| measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by endpointName_s

Donut.Query: [concat('Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=ARMVMUsageStats TimeGenerated>NOW-', parameters('dataCollectionFrequency'),'Minutes  Usagemetric_s=cores ShowinDesigner_d!=0|measure max(currentValue_d) by Location_s')]

List.Query: [concat('Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=ARMVMUsageStats TimeGenerated>NOW-', parameters('dataCollectionFrequency'),'Minutes  Usagemetric_s=cores ShowinDesigner_d!=0|measure max(currentValue_d) by AzureSubscription_s,Location_s')]
